resources.string: एंड्रॉयड संकुल फाइल (और इसके असम्पीडित डेटा) अनुकूलन RAM की मात्रा को कम करने का सेवन किया।
Improves various TCP values for the IPv4 protocol such as timeout and sockets re-use.
Discards (\"trims\") unused blocks on a mounted filesystem, reducing the lag. It is recommended that you fstrim at least once in a week.
Sets the shutdown mode to hibernate and enables the Quick Power On feature, speeding up the boot time.

Enables the performance tuning mode, decreases the colors number to 16bpp (16 bits per pixel) and optimizes the \"fling\" velocity (smooth scroll) for a general improvement with minimal impact on battery.
Tunes the Low memory killer parameters for a better multitasking profile, based on the amount of RAM available.
Optimizes the touch pressure scale for improved user interface elements.
Improves the scrolling responsiveness and speed.
Changes the LCD density. Smaller values are equal to larger screen space. Long click for more information.
This has the potential to cause a bootloop on your device!\nIf you have set an absurd or inappropriate value for your device it will be passed to the properties file now!
was the chosen dpi value, proceed?
Optimizes the Wi-Fi scan interval, enables the power saving mode, disables the error reports without performance impacts to improve your battery life.
आपका SystemUi.apk पुनरारंभ किया जाएगा और फोन बंद कर दिया जाएगा।
Your device will be rebooted into recovery.
आपकी डिवाइस बूटलोडर मोड में रिबूट किया जाएगा।
आपके डिवाइस को बंद कर दिया जाएगा।

Storage permission will be used to:
 - Make backups
 - Retrieve the wallpaper
 - Logging
आवेदन सेटअप को पूरा करने के लिए नीचे बटन टैप करें।
If you don\'t want to see the Android striving to record everything that is happening in all applications, enable this option
Changes the hostname (the device\'s name when connected to a Wi-Fi or Ethernet network).
It seems that busybox was not found anywhere.\nThis application requires Stericson\'s busybox to work, please download and install it.
Learn basic scripting, how to execute scripts, mod building guide, where we took inspiration and some initial knowledge. Thanks, you are somewhere in our empty heart.
AdAway open source app, where we took adblocker hosts.\n– AdAway is currently maintained by 0-kaladin and Dāvis Mošenkovs. The original author is Dominik Schürmann.
We also use some open source scripts made by own paget96 and with contributions from several members of the developer community (check the license in such files).
Dominik Schürmann, 0-kaladin and Dāvis Mošenkovs for the:

▪ Reiny Zamayuti (TjReiny): Tips, suggestions, testing, review
▪ Jamiéric Gomes: Color, Material Design and layout tips
▪ Guilherme Augusto: Color, images and layout suggestions and analysis 
▪ Rivaldo Freitas: Color and layout suggestions
▪ Gominha: Bricks and layout suggestions
▪ Vinícius Nery (VinyX): Colors suggestions, Brazil >>> All

 – We did not forget you.

HEBF Optimizer is an application that aims to increase the performance of your device, also by focusing on battery performance, we didn\'t forget it.\nThe application also features a useful and intelligent toolbox that you can use whenever you want.
…And full battery, in a moment of a loving disillusion, on top of this, my device\'s battery was discharging fast, so I started working on HEBF with a empty heart and a full battery. \n– Ivsom Emídio
Affectionately nicknamed Mitch by the developers, it symbolizes the resurrection of an old version of HEBF

Could not find one or more files required for application operation. The most common cause is that the application was closed during the first opening or your system uses a different path to \"/data\".\nYou can clear the application\'s data to force the copy again.
Failed to read storage. Necessary permission denied.
For this function to work smoothly, you need to clear the cache and reboot.\nWhen you press OK the device will reboot.
Kernel panic is an action performed when the system detects a fatal software / hardware error from which it can\'t recover. Disabling it may slightly reduce lags and avoid random reboots.
Are you absolutely sure you are doing?
An public alternative to your current DNS provider. Google DNS (8.8.8.8 and 8.8.4.4) will improve the security and speed up the browsing.\nGuess what, it is free.
Improves a set of RIL and HSDPA properties, prefix and GPRS classes to improve the quality of the connection.
Tweaks for the buffer size of the connection types, from LTE to GPRS. Results in a better browsing experience.
Tweaks for the stagefright (the Android media library, not the bug). Results in smoother video streams.
Reduces the delay to receive or end a call.
Optimizes the screen composition properties and enables overlay UI mode for a better graphics quality.
Enables the hardware accelerated UI, forces GPU screen composing and disables the vsync for a much better performance at the cost of battery.
Open the Android settings screen for this application.
Those applications currently on the screen.
Those applications that are running in the background and still doing some actions.
Services needed by some applications. The Android keeps them alive in a space in RAM in case they are needed to do something.
Processes in idle, inactive but with a reserved space in case it is needed by an alive running application.
Those applications that provides the content needed for the Android and the applications to work, i.e the data, refreshing every X minutes.

The \"ghosts\", applications that you finished. The Android still keeps them in memory in order to open them again faster. They won\'t use CPU or drain battery and will get lost if more RAM is needed by another applcation.
LMK is a set of parameters that sets the limits at which applications are killed in order to free RAM. Set the value to the levels below in megabytes.
There are values missing, please check the text fields.
Force the use of English language in application

The Mediaserver process scans your device for media files. Most of the time only a reboot is enough to fix problems with it.\nIs Mediaserver draining your battery? Try to kill it (You may get no sound output).
Please allow HEBF modify settings, it is needed to e.g, change the brightness.
Please wait, this may take up to 1 minute.

This CPU balance attempts to run the workload in the system on minimum number of CPU packages and tries to keep rest of them idle for longer duration, helping other packages to be in idle state and save power.
These features require a custom kernel. If your kernel does not support one of them, it will remain hidden.
Wake up your device with a double tap on the screen, similar to Knock On of some LG devices.
Speeds up battery charging via USB when connected to a PC or notebook.
Fsync ensures that all data be written to the storage device, it waits until the device reports that the transfer has completed, preventing data loss if the system crashes. (Which may cause delays).
Crucial for low RAM devices, the KSM merges two kernel pages if they are found to have same data, helping the user to get more free space for the applications.
It seems that you have no option to enable.
Try again with another custom kernel.

This option will decrease the tendency of a process to be killed by the system in OOM (Out of memory) cases. This can only be set to a RUNNING process, that means you need to open / wake it up in order to see it in the below list.
What type of user are you?
OK, we will hide potentially risky options.
You command, we obey. Nothing will be hidden.
If you found a bug or have any suggestions please feel free to send us (via email). We will respond as soon as possible.
This option may slow down your device.
Does this app deserves your respect?\nIf you want, you can here contribute to the improvement of our work through a donation.\n Click one of the buttons below to continue.
Feeling heartbroken? Someone screwed up with you? Forget it. Your heart can be empty, do not let your battery get too!

If you are using a screen recorder app…\n\nWhen activated, the screen overlay interferes with the app and other permissions that were granted. To solve the problem you need to disable the overlay in order to fix other permissions.
You need to grant storage permissions in order to open this option.\n
Do you really want to close this application?

The busybox assures us that all commands will run on all versions of the system, it is a binary that gathers the most common LINUX / UNIX commands into one, so if one of them is missing on your system, it will be present in busybox.

This option flags the device as a low RAM one, turning off specific memory-intensive features (status bar tinting, notification panel background effect etc) which works poorly on low-memory devices.\n\nIf disabled, you may need to REBOOT to apply the changes.
Change the user type to show / hide risky options
Leave your review on the Google Play Store
You\'re %1$s steps away from unlocking advanced options
You have unlocked the advanced options!
A custom DNS can improve speed, response and security. It and can also allow you to access blocked websites and bypass some censorship filters of your network, depending of your location.

Fsync synchronizes a file\'s in-core state with the storage device so that all changed information can be retrieved even after the system crashed or was rebooted. For safety, if you disable it, make sure you have a proper backup.
Improve your performance in games by setting the CPU governor before open the game.
Indicates how low the entropy pool must be for devices be allowed to write to the entropy pool, not necessarily increasing it.
Indicates the minimum entropy that must be available before it can be read. This does not affect /dev/urandom.

Entropy is a measure of available random characters generated by the kernel. This randomness is provided through the interfaces /dev/random and /dev/urandom and used on several tasks. Most security tasks such as cryptography will demand \"good quality\" randomness while other tasks are most likely be interested on speed only. Increasing the speed of the randomness generation may improve performance and decrease security.
The size of the entropy pool, i.e.,the maximum reachable value.
स्वागत हे! यह गाइड आपको एप्लिकेशन सेटअप प्रक्रिया के माध्यम से मदद करेगा
Higher values mean that the process will be killed first.
The delay in seconds for the application to reapply changes.
The recommended frequency for trimming the file system is once a week
Created in the midst of a broken heart
[LMK] You can tap the current value to quickly get back to the default / found one
The LMK Manager can be quite meaningful if you find a good balance for it
\"Kernel Options\" will only be available if your kernel supports
It is never recommended to turn everything on at once
Hidden thumbnails are located in the \"DCIM\" folder
The green theme is a tribute in support of the Brazilian football team Chapecoense
Have you tried one of the widgets?

The Android Runtime (ART) uses ahead-of-time compilation to compile the dex code into native code at the time of installation, pre-optimizing it using the dex2oat tool so your processor can interpret the code easier.

Toggles the captive portal detection. If turned on, the system will try to check the connection quality in order to detect connectivity.\nIf turned off, the system will aways believe that the connection is healthy and will not draw the \"exclamation mark\" over the strength icon.
Houston, we\'ve had a problem… It looks like the app crashed the last time it was run. You can notify the developers about this or ignore.
Use the floating button to scan your storage for possible excludable files. After the scan is complete, a list of options will be provided. Make your selections and use the same button to clean
HEBF needs root access in order to work. Please ensure that you have superuser privileges and click on the button above
Control extra behavior of the game booster. Toggle options here to match your needs.
Control extra behavior of the VIP battery saver. Toggle options here to match your needs.

Put your device into a deep battery saving mode by setting the CPU governor along with several other parameters of your choice. This is useful when you want to lose the minimum battery level on your way home, for instance.

Disables some Google Play Services app services that run in the background, helping to save battery power.\nCareful, this option will deny any activity of those services, you might get unwanted results.
Restart the app (remove it from the Recents Apps) to apply changes
Resets the battery statistics and makes the system recreate them, Try this if the behavior of the system in relation to the battery seem strange.
The interval in milliseconds to issue wake up scans when Wi-Fi needs to connect.\nDefault: 300000ms.
The interval in milliseconds after which Wi-Fi is considered idle.\nDefault: 30000ms.
Allows scans to be enabled even if Wi-Fi is turned off for connectivity.
The interval in milliseconds to scan as used by the Wi-Fi supplicant.\nDefault: 15000ms.
The ART compiler filter options were not found on your system, you can close this window or enable them at your own risk.
Forces the Doze Mode to activate moments after the screen turns off.
Touch here to quickly set battery profiles
Touch here to quickly set performance profiles
Service is scheduled to run every %1$s minutes
Are you sure you want to set a blank value?
Touch here to apply the values you set using the input field
There is already a file with this name
Place #!/system/bin/sh on the first line. Only sh shells are allowed.
Use this button to add a shell script from the storage
Adjusts the minimum number of video frame periods per buffer swap to prevent the \"frame tearing\" (when you see half of one frame and half of another)
Service is scheduled to run every %1$s hours
Enforce Doze restrictions on whitelisted applications for a certain period of time
Disable Doze restrictions on blacklisted applications for a certain period of time
Sorry, this app cannot be blacklisted for now…
%1$s has been added to the blacklist
Wait approximately %1$s minutes before entering in %2$s mode
The password must contain at least 6 characters
There is no user with this email address
I\'ve read and accept the terms and conditions
This email address is already in use
Are you sure you want to replace all your data by restoring this backup?
Are you sure you want to replace all your data by importing this configuration file?
Are you sure you want to delete your account?\nYour data will not be preserved. After the operation, you will be disconnected.
Forget the past and join the club
A dark wallpaper can help saving battery on AMOLED screens by reducing the amount of pixels turned on
Automatically sign in with the last account found when opening the application
Please consider purchasing HEBF Optimizer Pro in order to user this feature
Please enter a valid email address
Disable the service when connecting the charger
and it works on improving your battery.
Tapping here now will cancel and return to /proc/sys
The script took too long to finish its execution and thus it was killed
Your battery will have a VIP treatment
पासवर्ड रिकवरी के लिए एक ईमेल %s को भेजा गया है।

Use this option to control which apps can be executed on startup. By default, all apps holding the RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED permission will receive a broadcast indicating that the system finished booting.
एप्लिकेशन संचालन और अनुमतियां प्रबंधित करें
This service will automatically force stop an application at its details screen once you invoke it (through HEBF only).
आवेदन का एक अद्यतन संस्करण है
HEBF Optimizer Pro is available for only %s for a limited time!
यह आपकी बैटरी को बचाएगा, अनावश्यक सुविधाओं को बंद कर देगा और दूसरों को सीमित करेगा, जो आपके बैटरी को निकालने वाले अनुप्रयोगों को रोक देगा जो आपको अपने डिवाइस का सर्वश्रेष्ठ प्रदान करेगा।
हमें बैटरी-सेविंग क्रियाएं करने और निष्क्रिय अनुप्रयोगों को बंद करने की आपकी अनुमति की आवश्यकता है। जारी रखने पर क्लिक करें और सेटिंग स्क्रीन खुल जाएगी, नीचे दिए गए ट्यूटोरियल के समान कुछ ढूंढें:
busybox बाइनरी कॉपी करने में विफल
डाउनलोड की गई फ़ाइल नहीं मिली!
असुरक्षित ऑपरेशन, अखंडता जांच विफल रही। इसे फिर से डाउनलोड करने का प्रयास करें।
अब सबसे अच्छा गेमिंग अनुभव प्राप्त करें!
Better optimization for your game, this option will use everything in our reach, to give you a game with less FPS drops for the best possible experience
आपका डिवाइस फिलहाल चार्ज कर रहा है, क्या आप वाकई इस विकल्प को सक्षम करना चाहते हैं?
Busybox स्थापित किया गया है, एप्लिकेशन को पुनरारंभ करने के लिए ठीक टैप करें।
आप HEBF ऑप्टिमाइज़र के माध्यम busybox को डाउनलोड और इंस्टॉल करने का प्रयास कर सकते हैं या Google Play Store से किसी भी busybox इंस्टॉलर ऐप को डाउनलोड कर सकते हैं और इससे इंस्टॉल कर सकते हैं।
ऑटो 15 मिनट के बाद अपने गेम को अनुकूलित करें, भारी या खुले दुनिया के गेम में बहुत उपयोगी है (यह आपके गेम को गड़बड़ कर सकता है, अगर आप निश्चित हैं तो इसे सक्रिय करें)
ऑटो हर 15 मिनट में अपने डिवाइस को अनुकूलित करें, यह विकल्प आपको आपके डिवाइस के प्रदर्शन में एक नया अनुभव देगा
छिपा रास्ता का उपयोग कर छुपा अनुभाग खोजें
Add a prop using the Build.prop Editor
एक विन्यास फाइल ऑनलाइन साझा करें
सटीक समान सुविधाओं के साथ प्रीमियम पैकेज का स्वाद, लेकिन विज्ञापन प्रस्तुति के साथ
यह अनूठी खरीद HEBF ऑप्टिमाइज़र में उपयोग करने के लिए अतिरिक्त सुविधाएं प्रदान करती है, जैसे बल-स्टॉप, कस्टम सेवा शेड्यूलिंग और ऐपऑप्स प्रबंधक के लिए असीमित एप्लिकेशन चयन
वर्तमान बिलिंग API संस्करण अनुरोधित प्रकार के लिए समर्थित नहीं है
अनुरोधित सुविधा इस वर्तमान डिवाइस पर Google Play Store द्वारा समर्थित नहीं है
आइटम खरीदने के बाद से खरीदने में विफल रहा है
अनुरोधित उत्पाद खरीद के लिए उपलब्ध नहीं है
कनेक्शन स्थापित करने में विफल, कृपया पुनः प्रयास करें
सर्वर से खरीदारियों को पुनः प्राप्त करने के लिए टैप करें
VIP Battery Saver can save lives
आप गैर रूट मोड दर्ज करेंगे
खेलने से पहले, यहां से अपना खेल खोलेंa
हमारा समर्थन आपके निपटारे में है
हमें विश्वास है कि आपका समय मूल्यवान है
हम आपके दिल को महसूस कर सकते हैं
कृपया अपने खाते से लॉग इन करें
ऐप को हाइबरनेट करते समय दृश्य अव्यवस्था को कम करने के लिए, कृपया स्क्रीन पर HEBF ऑप्टिमाइज़र विंडो दिखाएं

If you prefer, you can get the same file on GitHub with the difference of being able to see the files already translated. Download the files directly from there or fork the project, then you just need to open a pull-request when you finish translating.

The strings.xml file contains the text used in this application. You can copy the translation file to your storage if you want to translate it using your phone. Once you\'re done translating, just send us back through our email support.
ऐप को पुनरारंभ करने के बाद पुनः प्रयास करें, अगर त्रुटि बनी रहती है, तो समर्थन से संपर्क करें।
आपका अस्थायी पैकेज समाप्त हो गया है! अपनी सुविधाओं का उपयोग जारी रखने के लिए अब प्रीमियम पैकेज खरीदें।

Thank you for your interest in translating this app, here are some tips: - If you need to use quotation marks, place a backslash before each - \\n means a line break, keep in mind - Do not translate %s, %1$s, %2$d etc. They represent variable data that will be shown when the app is running.
